Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
```
I am using native mode, i can only activate other native mode coin and can't activate lite mode. The same happens if I activate a lite mode coin, then I can only activate other lite mode coins but not native mode.
```
thats how agama works right now, guys

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
I am preparing a support guide right now, but for people facing the ` "blockchain.address.get_balance"` error,
goto settings -> app config -> Toggle off the button beside "Use Proxy" -> save settings -> restart agama

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000029569-how-to-stop-agama-from-using-a-proxy-server-to-access-electrum-servers
try the above fix if facing electrum connectivity issues on Agama Desktop SPV/Lite mode.

Content: updating Agama wouldn't touch wallet.dat

Author: SHossain#0007
Content:
`why those addresses disappeared?`
maybe he removed wallet.dat

Content: need more info and debug.log

Author: SHossain#0007

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: no

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: wallet.dat is not encrpted by default

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: it can be encrypted using Settings > CLI for only coins that are `-ac_public=1`

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: those are not installed apps. macOS uses `.dmg` file which works like a .iso or something like that.

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: all installed apps reside in Applications

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: even with all those, 2 Agama versions will use the same data dir

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: @SHossain silly question how do you remove a account from agama?

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: you need to go to `~/.agama/shephard/pin/` data dir and delete the `.pin` file you want.

Author: Nabob#5004
Content: You  can also delete going to settings > encrypt seed > delete the pin

Content: and that ^^

Author: RallyMonkey#3596
Content: hello guys, is there a way to earn passive income via KMD?

Author: yorklab#7270
Content: Hold your KMD in the Agama wallet to get rewards. Must claim it at least once a month.

Author: RallyMonkey#3596
Content: any minimum amount? and when do you mean by  claim it once a month?

Author: yorklab#7270
Content: at least >10 KMD

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: The utxo has to be > 10kmd so make sure you have all set in one utxo and claim it once a month

Author: CHMEX#0686
Content: Agama will tell you if yoy dont accrue

Author: yorklab#7270
Content: You will see a "claim" icon appear when you have started accumulating rewards. It's very simple. Claim anytime, but at least once a month or it stops accruing.

Author: RallyMonkey#3596
Content: ok good, i have 70 so should work thanks!
